Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.visualInformationBuilder.businessRules.publicCommonObr.core.rules.obr

Interface Summary
ObrModelIdentifier Base interface for all the OBR Model Identifiers.
 

Class Summary
ObrAbstractRuleActionImpl Abstract rule action obr implementation.
ObrBusinessRuleID Default ModelIdentifier based on a random UUID.
ObrBusinessRuleImpl OBR business rule implementation.
ObrBusinessRulesDataModelImpl OBR specific rules data model implementation.
ObrBusinessRulesDataModelImplTest  
ObrBusinessRulesModelImpl Model containing the rulesets.
ObrBusinessRulesModelImplTest  
ObrCallActionImpl Call action obr implementation.
ObrCompositeModelIdentifierImpl Composite Model Identifier.
ObrExpressionConverter Converter for expressions of all OBR.
ObrExpressionConverterTest  
ObrExpressionVisitorImpl Expression visitor for OBR.
ObrLoadContext Context specific to OBR for loading from the dictionary
ObrLoadContextTest  
ObrModelIdentifierImpl OBR specific implementation of a unique identifier of a ModelComponent.
ObrModifyActionImpl Modify Action impl for OBR.
ObrObjectFactory Factory class to create the Obr objects.
ObrRuleActionClauseImpl Obr implementation of the RuleActionClause
ObrRuleClauseImpl  
ObrRuleConditionClauseImpl Obr implementation of the RuleConditionClause
ObrRuleConditionImpl OBR rule condition implementation.
ObrRulePropertiesImpl OBR rule properties implementation.
 

Exception Summary
ObrDataException Unchecked exception thrown to indicate that the data loading failed.
